Description_lang: Creates a pyre at a targeted location, burning nearby targets. As well, moving flames form at the pyre, traveling outward.Coming into contact with either of these elements applies Blaze to the target, inflicting $158241s1 Fire damage every second for $158241D. This effect stacks.
AuraDescription_lang: Inflicts $158241s1 Fire damage every second.Increases Fire damage taken by $158241s2%.
